title: 210 - The Church as an Enemy Making Machine - with David Fitch
description:
Mike interviews David Fitch about his book "The Church of Us vs. Them:
Freedom from a Faith That Feeds on Making Enemies." They have a great conversation about what banners we've been given that we continue to hide behind, our fascination with attraction and how it has framed relationships and how was it that Jesus made enemies... As always, thanks for listening!
